"Been suffering hirsutism since I was 17, course, dark hairs on my neck, chin, and up the sides of my face, its got worse as the years have went on I'm now 25 and couldn't cope any longer, I kept this to myself and it drained the life out of me, I didn't go out, I suffered depression I had to shave twice a day depending on what I had to do on that day, if I wasn't at work I wouldn't shave and stayed at home because shaving every day was ruining my face with so many rashes, i finally got the courage to visit my gp and she prescribed me this, I've been using this cream for 4 weeks and I'm already seeing an improvement, don't suffer ladies, get vaniqa!!"

"To all the negitive reviews it really depends on the person I had my youngest december 26 2015 and in mid January I got the depo shot and I've lost weight I hadn't had a peroid I only had two days of spotting my sex drive is starting to come back and as far as moody goes I've been Moody my whole life here my skin is clear that's about all I can say so please don't listen to the negatives I know there's a lot built depends on the person"

"I’ve been on nexplanon for 9 months 

Pros : don’t have to worry about taking it on time, easy and fairly painless  insertion, doesn’t have negatives of an IUD like cramping and painful sex, don’t have to think about it, bigger boobs (some people may not like this), less periods, no babies

Cons: getting hormonal acne (I have never had acne growing up until now at 23...) , random periods that you can’t predict (even at 9 months it will come for 3 weeks even and go away for a long time- it’s annoying), expensive

I’ve also have had an lower libido but not sure if it’s from BC but my doctor can tell there’s a lot of hormonal things going on that I haven't had before."
"As your doctor may direct, it's sometimes necessary to reapply permethrin one or two weeks after the initial treatment. "

"Absolutely made me in agony in my joints,  I have osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis and osteoporosis and fybromylia and after taking trazodone I couldn't walk or lift my arms and was screaming out in pain"
